name: Hentai Puzzle Quest
description:
Hentai Puzzle Quest is a simple puzzle game. The aim of the game is to relax the player through art and music.
    Features:
  • 24 leveles
  • over 6 minutes of relaxing music
  • puzzles with more than 20 pieces
  • beautiful women
  • Ability to play with one hand.

Game at 100% should take around 25-35min
